html: clefts/tops of the ragged rocks. The proud and the haughty are found in the clefts and tops of rocks (2:19; Jer. 49:16; Obad. 1:3). In times of trouble the wicked choose to flee into the rocks of the earth, rejecting Jehovah, who is the "Rock of Israel" (2 Sam. 23:3) and the "Rock of Heaven" (Moses 7:53). Meanwhile, the righteous build on the rock of Christ and will never fall (Matt. 7:24-27). It is possible that the clefts of the rocks mentioned in Isa. 2:21 will be produced by the earthquake mentioned in Isa. 2:19.
